text: <@U0KM61BCP>,  this is pretty cool <https://waffle.io>, which can show the github issues and PR in real time.

text: yes, we evaluated that at IBM and ended up preferring Zenhub (which we had been using for openblockchain, before we migrated the repository to hyperledger) <https://www.zenhub.io/>

attachments.title: ZenHub.io
attachments.text: Supercharge your GitHub workflow! ZenHub keeps your team lean and agile with features built specifically for fast-moving engineering teams, high-impact startups, and the open-source community.
